name: ScriptExpose 1.0
author: ALessandro binwavelab@gmail.com

sections.description:
The installation creates an scriptexpose menu dedicated
you can build modules , where you can place text and images , and assign it to template
through the scriptexpose menu you find a panel to customize the template to combine the modules.
Finally it will generate the shortcode to be included in html pages or in the articles of your wordpress
In addition, each module can contain more than one items
which we will be listed in the articles in which you include the shortcode dedicated .

ScripExpose contains third party software .
jquery.colopicker with which you can change colors and transparencies of background
Copyright © 2011-2016 Martijn W. van der Lee. Licensed under the MIT.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ScriptExpose.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog: This is the first version of scriptexpose 1.0

short_description: It allows the user administrator to customize text and images contained in html tag , which will be saved in a dedicated database .
